SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.application

Class ApplicationUtil

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.application.ApplicationUtil
public final class ApplicationUtil extends Object
Utility class providing initialization and access to application-wide components such as application preferences and recently used documents.

Preferences can be explicitly initialized via initApplicationPreferences(Preferences). If not initialized, preferences() will lazily create an ephemeral (non-persistent) root via EphemeralPreferences.root() and log a warning.

This class is thread-safe.

  • Method Details

    • initApplicationPreferences

      public static void initApplicationPreferences(Preferences prefs)
      Initializes the application preferences exactly once. Subsequent calls throw an IllegalStateException.
      Parameters:
      prefs - non-null preferences instance (e.g., Preferences.userNodeForPackage(Class))
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if prefs is null
      IllegalStateException - if already initialized

    • preferences

      public static Preferences preferences()
      Returns the application's Preferences.

      If not explicitly initialized, an ephemeral, non-persistent root is created on first access, and a warning is logged. To ensure persistence, call initApplicationPreferences(Preferences) during application startup.

      Returns:
      the application's preferences (never null)

    • recentlyUsedDocuments

      public static RecentlyUsedDocuments recentlyUsedDocuments()
      Returns the singleton instance of RecentlyUsedDocuments.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance

    • getUiMode

      public static UiMode getUiMode()
      Retrieves the current UI mode of the application.
      Returns:
      the current application UI mode, which is an instance of UiMode

    • setUiMode

      public static void setUiMode(UiMode mode)
      Sets the application's UI mode and updates the dark mode setting accordingly. If the specified UI mode differs from the previous mode, any necessary adjustments are made, including determining whether the application should utilize dark mode and invoking appropriate listeners.
      Parameters:
      mode - the desired UI mode for the application. Must be one of UiMode.DARK, UiMode.LIGHT, or UiMode.SYSTEM_DEFAULT.

    • isDarkMode

      public static boolean isDarkMode()
      Checks whether the application is currently in dark mode.
      Returns:
      true if the application is in dark mode, false otherwise

    • addDarkModeListener

      public static void addDarkModeListener(Consumer<Boolean> listener)
      Adds a listener to receive updates when the application's dark mode status changes. The listener is a consumer that takes a boolean, where true indicates that dark mode is enabled, and false indicates that dark mode is disabled.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to be notified of dark mode changes (non-null)

    • removeDarkModeListener

      public static void removeDarkModeListener(Consumer<Boolean> listener)
      Removes a listener for dark mode changes in the application.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to be removed; typically a Consumer that processes a Boolean indicating the dark mode state (true if dark mode is enabled, false otherwise)
